name: Little Witch Rue (and the Can-Do Brew)
name_original: Little Witch Rue (and the Can-Do Brew)
description:
Arrow Keys and WASD to Move, Spacebar to jump! Currently, touching hazards just kicks you back to the start of the level.

A little game about a little witch collecting ingredients to make her first witch brew! I had the idea to build a game inspired by children's books and really leaned into the whimsical nature of many of them. This is a homework assignment, but comments and bug reports are appreciated, so I can learn more ^_^.

 Thanks for reading, playing, and commenting!

ART: All visual assets were drawn by me!! 

SFX: Sounds from Zapsplat.com

MUSIC: Childhood by Mike Chino https://soundcloud.com/mike-chino
